name: WW7 2016 Two
description: A classic style shooter game. Weapons spawn around the map and it is you vs. the other team. We have several maps to chose from to start your adventure on with your buds. Get together and play this game at a LAN party for tons of fun. If you want to play with friends over the internet then no problem. I suggest using https://www.evolvehq.com/welcome to have the same IP address as your buddy and play LAN over the internet.
